summary:
WhisperAI Transcription Report
Title: Planning the college technical fest
Date: 10/29/2025
Duration: 234 seconds
Language: en
TRANSCRIPTION
Meeting topic planning. Nikita, can you check the availability of the main seminar hall and labs? If you give them
branding space and a short slot I will send them the event proposal by tomorrow. Let's get started with our Technova 2025 planning meeting. We can organize a 24 hour
hackathon, a web design challenge and a robotics line follower event.
decisions:
They both are agreed to guide us
during the hackathon and workshop.

actions.task: We will need sponsor for any additional amount.

need another 5,000 for materials and certificates.
